body:
The value of `this->_grad_fn` on the view doesn't matter here. It'll be overwritten by the next call to `grad_fn()` to an instance of `AsStridedBackward` and look like your third graph.

I'll change this so it updates the `_grad_fn` immediately.

**EDIT**: we don't want to set `_grad_fn` to nullptr on the view because that makes it appear as a leaf.
